datetime.title: Datetime
datetime.description: Time at which the interval starts.

direction.title: Direction
direction.description: A categorization of measurement properties based on the direction of the energy flow. For example: outgoing, ingoing, flow.

nettransfercapacity.title: Net Transfer Capacity (NTC)
nettransfercapacity.description: Transfer capacity forecast agreed by Elia and its neighbouring transmission system operators (TSOs) for imports and exports across Belgiumâ€™s borders. Visit Transmission capacity at borders for more information on the calculation method. EU Regulation 543/2013 refers to net transfer capacity as 'forecasted capacity'.

proposedcapacity.title: Proposed Capacity
proposedcapacity.description: The capacity for auction, before the addition of the resales capacity.

yearlytoquarterlyresales.title: Yearly to Quarterly Resales
yearlytoquarterlyresales.description: Resale of capacity allocated during previous auctions.

capacityforauction.title: Capacity for auction
capacityforauction.description: Sum of the proposed capacity and the resales of previously allocated capacity. This capacity is sold on the market through explicit auctions organised by JAO.EU, an auction office set up by a group of TSOs (including Elia). EU Regulation 543/2013 refers to this capacity as 'offered capacity'. In case of yearly auctions there is no previously allocated capacity.
